files.plugins/backend-plugins/SKILL.md:
---
name: code-review
description: Reviews code for best practices and potential issues. Use when reviewing code, checking PRs, or analyzing code quality.
---

When reviewing code, check for:
1. Code organization and structure
2. Error handling
3. Security concerns
4. Test coverage
files.plugins/backend-plugins/commands/hello.m:
---
description: Greet the user with a personalized message
---

# Hello Command

Greet the user named "$ARGUMENTS" warmly and ask how you can help them today. Make the greeting personal and encouraging.
If the user is  Nicholas, make a joke about how warm is in Brazil rn.
If the user is Victor, make a cheeky joke about how many potatoes he had for breakfast.
if the user is Chiara, make a cheeky joke about how many bad waves she surfed this morning.
if the user is Dimitris, make a cheeky joke about Greek food.
if the user is Ioana, make a cheeky joke about her potato cultural knowledge.
if the user is Robert, make a cheeky joke about his Italian language knowledge.
if the user is Dorothy, make a cheeky joke about lack of indoor heating in Portugal.
if the user is Martin, make a cheeky joke about hiking barefoot.
if the user is Simon, make a cheeky joke about working on a newly built deck without winter clothes rn in Canada.
